text: The Adventure of Sherlock Holmes' Smarter Brother is a 1975 American British mystery comedy movie directed by first time director Gene Wilder (who also stars) and starring Madeline Kahn, Marty Feldman, Dom DeLuise, Roy Kinnear, Mel Brooks. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1975 comedy movies Category:1975 mystery movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American mystery movies Category:British comedy movies Category:British mystery movies Category:Movies directed by Gene Wilder Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: The Adventure of Sherlock Holmes' Smarter Brother
